title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for 3 leaves

1 point is earned for Max r = 2 and correct leaf placement
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

1 point is earned for 3 leaves

1 point is earned for Max r = 2 and correct leaf placement

The student response earns one of the following points:

1 point is earned for 3 leaves

1 point is earned for Max r = 2 and correct leaf placement

The student response earns all of the following points:

1 point is earned for 3 leaves

1 point is earned for Max r = 2 and correct leaf placement

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for constant and limits of integration

1 point is earned for integrand

1 point is earned for anti differentiation and evaluation

A= 1 2 ∫ 0 π 4 sin 2 3θ dθ= ∫ 0 π ( 1−cos6θ )  dθ= [ θ− 1 6 sin6θ ]| 0 π =π or  3 2 ∫ 0 π 3 4 sin 2 3θ dθ=⋅⋅⋅=π or  6 2 ∫ 0 π 6 4 sin 2 3θ dθ=⋅⋅⋅=π

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for x = 2sin3θcosθ | y =2sin3θsinθ

1 point is earned for dx/dθ

1 point is earned for dy/dθ

1 point is earned for the answer

or

1 point is earned if expresses curve in rectangular coordinates

2 points are earned for implicit differentiation

1 point is earned for answer

x=2sin3θcosθ y=2sin3θsinθ dx dθ =−2sin3θsinθ+6cos3θcosθ dy dθ =−2sin3θcosθ+6cos3θsinθ At θ= π 4 , dy dθ =−2 and  dx dθ =−4,so dy dx = −2 −4 = 1 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@B09C@

or

( x 2 + y 2 ) 2 =6 x 2 y−2 y 3 2( x 2 + y 2 )( 2x+2y dy dx )=6 x 2 dy dx +12xy−6 y 2 dy dx At θ= π 4 ,x=1 and y=1 so 4( 2+2 dy dx )=6 dy dx +12−6 dy dx 8+8 dy dx +12⇒ dy dx = 1 2
